value.title: The Real Threat Of AI Is Untrammeled Corporate Power
value.excerpt: Here is the risk in a nutshell: new digital technologies allow a few corporations to gain huge amounts of power by exploiting changes in how we live our lives.

value.title: AI safety use cases - how generative AI is distorting human sentiment
value.excerpt: It used to be said that the big problem with AI is its ‘hallucinations’ when supporting data is absent. But it turns out that there is a bigger one: generative AI is removing human sentiment and context without us even knowing.

value.title: The growth of AI in social media
value.excerpt: The internet and social media have changed the world since the advent of websites like Facebook, Instagram and the long-gone Myspace. The era of social media has allowed for people to communicate across vast distances and maintain friendships in a way that was not possible just 20 years ago.

value.title: UK AI Safety Summit – the diginomica preview
